Editor's Note:  At the Recessed Meeting of June 6, 2017 held on June 15, 2017, CM Rose corrected her vote in regard to M-499 & Res Nos. 1534 & Res 1535 (Capital Budget) and thereby updated and revised the vote on this coupled item to 49-0-0.

Editor's Note: CMs Mendez and Mealy are considered Present but Not Voting for the items coupled on the General Order Calendar of the Stated Meeting held on June 6, 2017.

Items.MinutesNote: At this point, the Public Advocate (Ms. James) declared the Expense-Revenue-Contract Budget, the Capital Budget, the Community Development Program Budget for Fiscal Year 2018; all as modified and all in accordance with the relevant sections of the New York City Charter; as hereby adopted on this 6th day of June 2017 at 3:19 pm.

The presence of a quorum was announced by The Public Advocate (Ms. James).

Editor's Note:  CM Mendez was marked present for this Stated Meeting held on June 6, 2017.  
CM Mealy was subsequently marked as Present but Not Voting for this Stated Meeting held on June 6, 2017 due to her attendance at the Recessed Meeting of June 6, 2017 held on June 15, 2017.
